import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { addToCart } from '../redux/actions/cartActions'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function Cart(props) { const productId = props.match.params.id; const qty = props.location.search ? Number(props.location.search.split('=')[1]) : 1; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { if (productId) { dispatch(addToCart(productId, qty)); } }, [dispatch, productId, qty]); const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const { cartItems } = cart; return (
